name: Valpath
description:
Valpath is a top-down boss rush game (actually with only one boss), where the main character, Ghor, is on a quest to reach passage to Valhalla.

Controls (use preferably a controller):

move: dpad / left stick

attack: x / y

dash: a / b

Controls (keyboard):

move: wasd / arrows /

attack: q / ctrl

dash: space

Art made by Barbara Ueki
